description: Kids, Open Your Art Shop Today: Create & Sell Your Handmade Crafts. This course is designed to be a simple guide for children ages 4 to 14 who want to create and sell their artistic crafts. Youth, children, and teens are blessed with many God-given gifts & talents! We show you how to share your skills with others. Turn your craft hobby into an art store. Learn to plan your business, market and sell your wares, calculate a profit, and grow your business. We even show you how to bring on a partner, and exit when the time is right. If you enjoy jewelry making, painting, wood working, or any type of crafts, you will enjoy this course.
title: Kids, Open Your Art Shop Today!
